Also TV has now started in Sweden.
Unfortunately the Scandinavian countries
are left behind in this respect. Denmark
has been the first country in this area
to start transmitting TV and depending
on fabourable geographical and topo¬
graphical conditions the inhabitants in
this flat country have the possibility to
profit by this latest technical development.
In Sweden and Norway the authorities
have hesitated, due to quite contrary
circumstances, compared to the advantages
which Denmark enjoys. Sweden started
last year with a transmitter in Stockholm
and during the next five years the TV
network is authorised to be built up over
the whole country. In Norway the
authorities recently have determined to
start TV transmitting. The Tandberg
factory therefore has had no possibility
to start manufacturing TV receivers
earlier. Now the development has com¬
menced but delivery can not be expected
within one or two years.

MASKIN & ELEKTRO however star¬
ted on the TV market last year and
succeded in getting the representation
in Sweden for the American CBS receivers
an since half a year ago also for the
largest English TV manufactory, E. K.
Cole Ltd with the make »Ekco». Maskin
& Elektro has been supplying the Swedish
market with the best TV receivers from
U. S. and England. TV is a product
demanding a lot of accessories and also
in that respect M & E has secured the
representation for the best products in
every line. Thus M & E is handling the
Swedish agency for i. a. Finco TV an¬
tennas, Alliance antenna rotors, Jerrold
antenna boosters and different other
accessories from the largest American
manufacturers.
As our company is so well established in high class
taperecorder business M & E has also a demand for profes¬
sional equipments. After negotiations in Redwood City last
year the company is representing Ampex Corp., manufacturing
the world famous Ampex professional recording equipments.
When marketing taperecorders, the supplyer also must be
able to deliver tape. For two years M & E has represented
the famous American make »Soundcraft». This brand of tape
is now accepted in the Swedish market as of the highest class.
M & E has also entered the market for Hi-Fi amplifiers
and has by that means carried out its intention only to
represent the best in every line. Therefore the company has
brought McIntosh and Bell Hi-Fi amplifiers.
The principle of M & F has been and will be »only the
best in every liney>. Retailers and their customers know that
they can depend upon a product delivered by M & F.
